verses.kjv: Thus saith the LORD, The heaven is my throne, and the earth is my footstool: where is the house that ye build unto me? and where is the place of my rest?
verses.ct: This is what the LORD says: "Heaven is my throne, and the earth is my footstool. What kind of house could you possibly build for me? Where would my resting place be?

verses.kjv: For all those things hath mine hand made, and all those things have been, saith the LORD: but to this man will I look, even to him that is poor and of a contrite spirit, and trembleth at my word.
verses.ct: My hand made all these things, and that is how they came to exist," declares the LORD. "But this is the person I will pay attention to: the one who is humble, broken in spirit, and who trembles at my word.

verses.kjv: He that killeth an ox is as if he slew a man; he that sacrificeth a lamb, as if he cut off a dog’s neck; he that offereth an oblation, as if he offered swine’s blood; he that burneth incense, as if he blessed an idol. Yea, they have chosen their own ways, and their soul delighteth in their abominations.
verses.ct: The one who slaughters an ox is like someone who kills a person; the one who sacrifices a lamb is like someone who snaps a dog's neck; the one who presents a grain offering is like someone offering pig's blood; the one who burns incense is like someone praising an idol. Yes, they have chosen their own paths, and their soul takes pleasure in their disgusting practices.

verses.kjv: I also will choose their delusions, and will bring their fears upon them; because when I called, none did answer; when I spake, they did not hear: but they did evil before mine eyes, and chose that in which I delighted not.
verses.ct: So I will also choose harsh treatment for them and bring on them exactly what they dread. Because when I called, no one responded; when I spoke, they refused to listen. They did what was evil in my sight and chose what displeases me."

verses.kjv: Hear the word of the LORD, ye that tremble at his word; Your brethren that hated you, that cast you out for my name’s sake, said, Let the LORD be glorified: but he shall appear to your joy, and they shall be ashamed.
verses.ct: Listen to the word of the LORD, you who tremble at his word: "Your brothers who hate you and exclude you because of my name have said, 'Let the LORD show his glory!' But he will appear to bring you joy, and they will be put to shame."

verses.kjv: A voice of noise from the city, a voice from the temple, a voice of the LORD that rendereth recompence to his enemies.
verses.ct: Listen! An uproar from the city! A sound from the temple! It is the voice of the LORD paying back his enemies what they deserve.

verses.kjv: Before she travailed, she brought forth; before her pain came, she was delivered of a man child.
verses.ct: Before she even went into labor, she gave birth; before the pains hit her, she delivered a son.

verses.kjv: Who hath heard such a thing? who hath seen such things? Shall the earth be made to bring forth in one day? or shall a nation be born at once? for as soon as Zion travailed, she brought forth her children.
verses.ct: Who has ever heard of such a thing? Who has ever seen anything like it? Can a country be established in a single day? Can a nation be born all at once? Yet as soon as Zion went into labor, she gave birth to her children.

verses.kjv: Shall I bring to the birth, and not cause to bring forth? saith the LORD: shall I cause to bring forth, and shut the womb? saith thy God.
verses.ct: "Would I bring a baby to the point of delivery and not let it be born?" says the LORD. "Would I who causes birth then close the womb?" says your God.

verses.kjv: Rejoice ye with Jerusalem, and be glad with her, all ye that love her: rejoice for joy with her, all ye that mourn for her:
verses.ct: Celebrate with Jerusalem and be happy for her, all you who love her! Share deeply in her joy, all you who have mourned over her.

verses.kjv: That ye may suck, and be satisfied with the breasts of her consolations; that ye may milk out, and be delighted with the abundance of her glory.
verses.ct: Then you will nurse and be satisfied from her comforting embrace; you will drink deeply and be delighted by the overflow of her glory.

verses.kjv: For thus saith the LORD, Behold, I will extend peace to her like a river, and the glory of the Gentiles like a flowing stream: then shall ye suck, ye shall be borne upon her sides, and be dandled upon her knees.
verses.ct: For this is what the LORD says: "Look, I will send peace flowing to her like a river, and the wealth of nations like a surging stream. You will nurse and be carried on her hip and bounced on her knees.

verses.kjv: As one whom his mother comforteth, so will I comfort you; and ye shall be comforted in Jerusalem.
verses.ct: Like a mother who comforts her child, that is how I will comfort you; and you will find your comfort in Jerusalem."

verses.kjv: And when ye see this, your heart shall rejoice, and your bones shall flourish like an herb: and the hand of the LORD shall be known toward his servants, and his indignation toward his enemies.
verses.ct: When you see this, your heart will rejoice, and your body will thrive like fresh grass. The LORD's power will be revealed to his servants, but his fury will be directed at his enemies.

verses.kjv: For, behold, the LORD will come with fire, and with his chariots like a whirlwind, to render his anger with fury, and his rebuke with flames of fire.
verses.ct: For look — the LORD will arrive with fire, and his chariots will come like a whirlwind, to unleash his anger with fury and his punishment with flames of fire.

verses.kjv: For by fire and by his sword will the LORD plead with all flesh: and the slain of the LORD shall be many.
verses.ct: With fire and with his sword, the LORD will execute judgment on all people, and those killed by the LORD will be many.

verses.kjv: They that sanctify themselves, and purify themselves in the gardens behind one tree in the midst, eating swine’s flesh, and the abomination, and the mouse, shall be consumed together, saith the LORD.
verses.ct: "Those who set themselves apart and purify themselves to go into the gardens, following the one in the center, eating pig meat, disgusting things, and mice — they will all come to an end together," declares the LORD.

verses.kjv: For I know their works and their thoughts: it shall come, that I will gather all nations and tongues; and they shall come, and see my glory.
verses.ct: "Because I know their actions and their thoughts, the time is coming when I will gather all nations and languages together. They will come and witness my glory.

verses.kjv: And I will set a sign among them, and I will send those that escape of them unto the nations, to Tarshish, Pul, and Lud, that draw the bow, to Tubal, and Javan, to the isles afar off, that have not heard my fame, neither have seen my glory; and they shall declare my glory among the Gentiles.
verses.ct: I will perform a sign among them, and I will send survivors from among them to the nations — to Tarshish, Pul, and Lud (who draw the bow), to Tubal and Javan, to the distant coastlands that have not heard about me or seen my glory. They will proclaim my glory among the nations.

verses.kjv: And they shall bring all your brethren for an offering unto the LORD out of all nations upon horses, and in chariots, and in litters, and upon mules, and upon swift beasts, to my holy mountain Jerusalem, saith the LORD, as the children of Israel bring an offering in a clean vessel into the house of the LORD.
verses.ct: They will bring all your brothers from every nation as an offering to the LORD — on horses, in chariots, in wagons, on mules, and on camels — to my holy mountain Jerusalem," says the LORD, "just as the people of Israel bring their offerings in clean vessels to the house of the LORD.

verses.kjv: And I will also take of them for priests and for Levites, saith the LORD.
verses.ct: And I will even select some of them to serve as priests and Levites," says the LORD.

verses.kjv: For as the new heavens and the new earth, which I will make, shall remain before me, saith the LORD, so shall your seed and your name remain.
verses.ct: "For just as the new heavens and the new earth that I will make will endure in my presence," declares the LORD, "so will your descendants and your name endure.

verses.kjv: And it shall come to pass, that from one new moon to another, and from one sabbath to another, shall all flesh come to worship before me, saith the LORD.
verses.ct: From one New Moon celebration to the next, and from one Sabbath to the next, all people will come to worship in my presence," says the LORD.

verses.kjv: And they shall go forth, and look upon the carcases of the men that have transgressed against me: for their worm shall not die, neither shall their fire be quenched; and they shall be an abhorring unto all flesh.
verses.ct: "They will go out and look at the dead bodies of those who rebelled against me. The worms feeding on them will never die, and the fire burning them will never go out, and they will be an object of horror to all people."
